--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Counter-Strike version 1.6 nosteam V58 is a modification and fully polonized.
Includes many additional options, both in the game menu and during gameplay, using the B key additional (in Polish) options.
This version is a revamped version of the author Kaman.
More information as well as modifiers to go to cstrike www.pobyku.com.
By installing this game you agree to the consequences of the product installation nosteam.
Feel free to test for www.pobyku.com servers where you can play free of charge on our servers / mods.
Start the game
Open console ~ (tilde) and type or copy the following commands: connect 31.186.83.235:27126
Press ENTER to confirm and play online with other players
More servers www.pobyku.com

Installation:
Run the setup.exe file
Set the path to the installation
Install
Play.
